thread.title: $149+ Airfare Sale to Europe on Wow Air
thread.title_full: $149+ Airfare Sale to Europe on Wow Air

title: $149+ Airfare Sale to Europe on Wow Air
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $149+ Airfare Sale to Europe on Wow Air $149+ Airfare Sale to Europe on Wow Air by SmarterTravel Staff - October 20, 2015 at 1:42 PM Tweet 
Iceland-based Wow Air's current airfare promotion features flights from the U.S. to Europe for as little as $149 one-way. Travel at these extremely affordable prices is valid on select dates between November 2015 and June 2016. Here's a look at some of the fares posted on the Wow Air website: Boston to Copenhagen, Denmark, for $149 O/W Boston to Amsterdam, Netherlands, for $199 O/W Boston to London, England, for $199 O/W Washington, D.C., to Reykjavik, Iceland, for $186 O/W Washington, D.C., to Berlin, Germany, for $199 O/W Washington, D.C., to Paris, France for $199 O/W 
How to get this deal: You can find these sale fares at Wow Air's website . 
Don't forget: Always compare prices from multiple airlines to make sure that you're getting the best price with this deal. Find Cheap Flights!
